title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs locally with a single CLI; ships Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. and an OpenAI-compatible REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models in 3 lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; markdown, code highlighting, multi-user, model manager.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI wrapper with prompts history, syntax highlighting, and plugins.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub-Copilot-like VS-Code extension that routes code completion to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Android compatible, reactive streams, Jackson JSON.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, completion, embeddings, and streaming via System.Text.Json.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All desktop UI with an Ollama backend option; switch between local models in one click.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made Docker-Compose stacks for CPU-only or NVIDIA-GPU Ollama plus optional web UI.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to spin up Ollama on AWS EC2 g5.xlarge with GPU drivers and model bootstrap.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama model endpoints, admin UI, and async chat consumer (Channels).

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that proxies to Ollama with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama builds on Linux/macOS with CUDA or ROCm variants.

title: ollama-model-zoo
summary: Community-curated collection of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs ready for ollama pull.
